scripts.test: npm run build && k6 run dist/tests/test.cjs
scripts.test:smoke: npm run build && k6 run dist/tests/smoke-test.cjs
scripts.test:load: npm run build && k6 run dist/tests/load-test.cjs --summary-mode=full
scripts.test:stress: npm run build && k6 run dist/tests/stress-test.cjs
scripts.test:spike: npm run build && k6 run dist/tests/spike-test.cjs
scripts.test:breakpoint: npm run build && k6 run dist/tests/breakpoint-test.cjs
scripts.test:soak: npm run build && k6 run dist/tests/soak-test.cjs
scripts.test:api: npm run build && npm run copyfiles && cross-env K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=k6-report.html k6 run -e BASE_URL=http://localhost:8000 -e MAILPIT_URL=http://localhost:8025 dist/tests/api-test.cjs --http-debug=full
